import React from "react"; import "../index.css"; import Header from "./Header.js"; import Main from "./Main.js"; import Footer from "./Footer.js"; import PopupWithForm from "./PopupWithForm.js"; //import ImagePopup from "./PopupWithForm.js"; function App() { const [isEditProfilePopupOpen, setEditProfileClick] = React.useState(false); const [isAddPlacePopupOpen, setAddPlacePopupOpen] = React.useState(false); const [isEditAvatarPopupOpen, setEditAvatarPopupOpen] = React.useState(false); return ( <>
setEditProfileClick(true)} onEditAvatar={() => setEditAvatarPopupOpen(true)} onAddPlace={() => setAddPlacePopupOpen(true)} />
setEditProfileClick(false)} isOpen={isEditProfilePopupOpen} buttonTitle="Сохранить" /> setAddPlacePopupOpen(true)} isOpen={isAddPlacePopupOpen} buttonTitle="Сохранить" /> setEditAvatarPopupOpen(false)} isOpen={isEditAvatarPopupOpen} buttonTitle="Сохранить" /> {/*

Редактировать профиль

Новое место

Обновить аватар

Вы уверены?

*/}
); } export default App;
